data.content:
noun
on a collision course
Two people or things that are on a collision course are moving and will crash into each other if one of them doesn't change direction.
The two airplanes were on a collision course.
The comet was on a collision course with the planet. - often used figuratively
The government's policies are putting us on a collision course with economic disaster.

chiều hướng dẫn đến va chạm
the Government and the unions are on a collision course
chính phủ và nghiệp đòan đang trên chiều hướng dẫn đến va chạm nhau
